derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'discharge a gun'): from French détacher, earlier destacher, from des- (expressing reversal) + attacher 'attach'

entry.def: If you detach one thing from another that it is fixed to, you remove it. If one thing detaches from another, it becomes separated from it.

example.ex: Detach the white part of the application form and keep it...
example.tran: 把申请表的白色部分撕下存底。

example.ex: It is easy to detach the currants from the stems...
example.tran: 很容易就能把醋栗从梗上摘下来。

entry.def: If you detach yourself from something, you become less involved in it or less concerned about it than you used to be.

example.ex: It helps them detach themselves from their problems and become more objective.
example.tran: 这有助于他们从所面临的问题中跳出来，变得更客观一些。

entry.def: If you detach yourself from a person or place, you leave them.

example.ex: Alexis saw his father detach himself from the group and walk away down the hill by himself.
example.tran: 亚历克西斯看到父亲离开那一群人，独自走下山去了。

means.word_mean: 1. cause to become detached or separated; take off;

sentences.sentence: "detach the skin from the chicken before you eat it"

means.word_mean: 2. military use: separate (a small unit) from a larger, especially for a special assignment;

sentences.sentence: "His retina detached and he had to be rushed into surgery"

auth_sentence.content: The idea was to detach Northeastern delegates from Gerald Ford.

attach[v.附上;依恋]+e→n.[在大使馆工作的]专员,随员

stems_affixes.value_cn: 分开, 分离, 分遣, 派遣[军队]
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+tach钉子,接角→把钉上的分开→拆开

Sentence.sentence: I knew that if I didn't get off the dating sites, I'd just keep going," detaching (使脱离) herself further from the outside world.
He would detach himself from the routines of life.
Most young boys are trained to believe that men should be strong, tough, cool, and detached.
They look at the world in a detached manner.

means.word_mean: 拆卸, 使分开, 使分离

sentences.en: They detached their trailer and set up camp.
sentences.cn: 他们卸下拖车, 架起帐篷。

sentences.en: The general detached a small force to go and guard the palace.
sentences.cn: 将军派遣一支小部队去保卫宫殿。

jushi.english: He detached his watch from the chain.
jushi.chinese: 他把表从表链上取下来。

jushi.english: They detached their trailer and set up camp.
jushi.chinese: 他们卸下拖车,架起帐篷。

jushi.english: He detached himself from his party and sauntered over to her table.
jushi.chinese: 他离开伙伴,逛到她的桌旁。
